doc:
Chris Demetral https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Demetral 0 Christopher Peter Demetral (born November 14, 1976) is an American former actor best known as Jeremy Tupper, the son of newly divorced New York book editor Martin Tupper (played by Brian Benben) on the HBO series Dream On and also Jack in Lois Clark. He also played the title character in the short-lived series The Secret Adventures of Jules Verne on the Sci Fi Channel. He also played Christopher Ewing in Dallas: J.R. Returns. Christopher_Peter_Demetral ( born November_14_,_1976 ) is an_American_former_actor best_known as Jeremy_Tupper , the_son of newly_divorced_New_York_book_editor_Martin_Tupper ( played by Brian_Benben ) on the_HBO_series_Dream On and also Jack in Lois_ . He also played the_title_character in the_short-lived_series The_Secret_Adventures of Jules_Verne on the_Sci_Fi_Channel . He also played Christopher_Ewing in Dallas : J.R._Returns .
